reviewText: My 3 year old granddaughter loves it!
My Grandson is 5 and loves all things Daniel Tiger.  He is developmentally disabled so this has helped him learn life skills in a musical, story book sort of way.  5 stars from me!.
My 2 year old son loves this video.  It's a great dvd for any Daniel Tiger fan!
My granddaughter loves Daniel Tiger and knows and sings most of the songs. This disc includes Neighbor Day which helps demonstrate good neighbor relations.

Gave it to my 1.5yr old as an xmas gift..he lit up with joy when he seen it was Daniel. He loves to watch Daniel tiger every morning. I got him the DVD to watch in the car since this is the only cartoon he will sit still for. We've had it on replay since getting it.
My grandson loves his Daniel tiger. We are happy with it.
My children are in love with this!
